thread.title: Week 8 Recruit Report: QB commit has monster game, Oklahoma State, Texas Tech RBs lead rushers
thread.title_full: Week 8 Recruit Report: Texas QB commit has monster game, Oklahoma State, Texas Tech RBs lead rushers | Dallas Morning News

author: Avi Zaleon
title: Week 8 Recruit Report: QB commit has monster game, Oklahoma State, Texas Tech RBs lead rushers
text:
Welcome to the weekly SportsDayHS Recruit Report in which we look at how the area's best recruits performed during the past week's high school games.
Please note that not every recruit is listed, including defensive players and linemen, since we do not have stats for them. Also note that players committed to colleges in the DMN coverage area (Texas, Texas A&M, Oklahoma, Baylor, TCU, SMU and North Texas) are listed below recruits who are either uncommitted or committed to out-of-area programs.
Class of 2016
(STANFORD) Flower Mound Marcus TE Kaden Smith: 1 catch, 25 yards, TD
Sachse WR Devin Duvernay: 3 catches, 50 yards, TD
(OHIO STATE) DeSoto QB Tristen Wallace: 14-of-21, 151 yards; 19 rushes, 168 yards, 2 TDs
(OREGON) Allen QB Seth Green: BYE
Lancaster ATH Tyrell Alexander: 10 carries, 114 yards; 4 catch, 40 yards
(STANFORD) Plano RB Brandon Stephens: 15 carries, 74 yards
Plano East WR Audie Omotosho: 5 catches, 97 yards, 2 TDs
Southlake Carroll RB Lil' Jordan Humphrey: 16 carries, 92 yards; 10 catches, 92 yards, TD
(CLEMSON) Argyle TE J.C. Chalk: 2 catches, 11 yards
(HOUSTON) Lovejoy QB Bowman Sells: 14-29, 208 yards, TD, INT; 14 carries, 41 yards, TD
(OKLAHOMA STATE) Argyle Liberty Christian QB Nick Starkel: 17-31, 174 yards, TD, INT
(ARKANSAS) Arlington Lamar WR Kofi Boateng: 5 catches, 138 yards, 2 TDs
Frisco Heritage WR Bubba Ogbebor: 8 catches, 158 yards, TD
(OKLAHOMA STATE) DeSoto RB La'Darren "LD" Brown: 15 carries, 179 yards, 4 TDs
(WASHINGTON) Lovejoy WR Aaron Fuller: 4 catches, 89 yards, TD
(KANSAS) Mansfield Timberview WR Braylon Royal: 5 catches, 104 yards, TD
Southlake Carroll WR Zach Farrar: 6 catches, 74 yards, TD
(SDSU) Plano East WR Tim Wilson: 2 catches, 48 yards, TD
(FRESNO STATE) West Mesquite TE Donte Coleman: N/A
Class of 2017
Wylie East RB Eno Benjamin: 37 carries, 205 yards, 3 TDs
DeSoto WR KD Nixon: 5 catches, 79 yards
Cedar Hill WR Camron Buckley: 4 catches, 85 yards, 2 TDs
Denton Guyer TE Brian Polendey: N/A
Lancaster WR Omar Manning: N/A
Cedar Hill QB Avery Davis: 13-of-19, 242 yards, 2 TDs; 3 carries, 15 yards, TD
Rockwall WR Sam Crawford: 6 catches, 139 yards, 2 TDs
South Oak Cliff ATH Markiese King: N/A
Waxahachie WR Jalen Reagor: 6 catches, 185 yards, TD
Mansfield RB Kennedy Brooks: OFF
Frisco Lone Star QB Jason Shelley: 11-of-17, 196 yards, 4 TDs; 15 rushes, 121 yards, TD
Parish Episcopal RB Dominic Williams: 19 rushes, 211 yards, 2 TDs
Texas Tech Skyline RB Da'Leon Ward: 13 carries, 176 yards, 3 TDs
Mansfield Lake Ridge QB Jett Duffey: 11-17, 159 yards, TDs; 7 carries, 127 yards, TD
Texas A&M N/A
TCU Denton Guyer 2017 QB Shawn Robinson: 6-15, 86 yards, 3 INTs; 14 rushes, 196 yards, TD
Baylor Mesquite Horn WR Jared Atkinson: 2 catches, 31 yards
Texas Arlington Lamar QB Shane Buechele: 11-18, 229 yards, 3 TDs, INT; 15, 134 yards, 2 TDs
Oklahoma Mesquite Horn 2017 QB Chris Robison: Injured
SMU N/A
North Texas N/A
